title: massgod
author: massgod
content: MASSGODWe bring cheap and fast mass DM service to humanity.Massgod is a DM marketing tool. It is the easiest and most effective way to promote your products or company on Discord, Twitter, Telegram, Whatsapp, Facebook and Instagram. All of our services are fully automated and constantly updated. All the tools we use are specially developed. It can pass all spam filters and never harm your page/server. All of our accounts are real profiles created about 5-6 years ago, so your customers click on the links thinking they are getting the message from a real person, and all the variables have been considered and designed for you to achieve maximum efficiency.✅ 500+ transactions done✅ fast delivery and contact✅ we can do up to 3M+ DMs weekly✅ we are legal UK companyPRICE:  1K/4.80$*Bulk purchases may have discounts.PAYMENT: Crypto & Card(Stripe) & PayPalCONTACT: massgod#8107 (discord)
